that strange distraction.content: a dip in cold water after days in the rough looking directly at the sun new days new ways to think about the same old things bugging me i wait for the chill to take over again and again

I’m convinced the thought that fills my mind most of the time is just a complex of [reactions](reactions.md) to the strange world I’m living in. Creative [urges](urges-1.md) struggle to redirect my mind to what I don’t see, to what might be.

**maybe it’s just me - or not**

We finally stop and for a moment, I think of running away.  They won't miss me - I'm not worth anything to them anyway.  It's a circular thing.  I go to the bathroom and return to the car knowing that I have nowhere else to go.  An eleven year old goes where he's taken.

a few puffs will do me good.content: So. Need to carry on and make the best of my time.
